titleStmt.title: Mercurius propheticus. Or, -a collection of some old predictions O! May they only prove, but empty fictions. Consensu populi regnum subsistit. That Kingdome will establisht be wherein the people well agree.
titleStmt.author: Shipton, Mother (Ursula)

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeere, M.DC.XLIII. [1643, i.e.1644]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
